function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rejection of behavioral change message and pandemic threat","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases, disregard for guidelines from medical experts","Mitigation":"Education on the efficacy of recommended response, addressing misinformation and conspiracy theories","Technologies":"Social media monitoring, fact-checking algorithms","People":"Consumers, general public","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Spread of false or misleading information about COVID-19","Impact":"Increased misinformation and confusion, undermining public health efforts","Mitigation":"Dissemination of accurate information, fact-checking and debunking false claims","Technologies":"Information verification tools, public awareness campaigns","People":"General public, consumers","Owner":"Health organizations, fact-checking organizations"},{"Description":"Violent reactions in public spaces to compliance with guidelines","Impact":"Risk of physical harm, intimidation of individuals and health workers","Mitigation":"Enhanced security measures, community engagement and de-escalation training","Technologies":"Surveillance cameras, emergency notification systems","People":"Public spaces visitors, health workers","Owner":"Public and private security organizations"}]}
